title: MarQ By Flipkart 60 cm (24 inch) HD Ready LED TV  (24HDNDMSVAB)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Television Set, Remote Control, Wallmount Stand, 2 AAA Batteries, 2 Desktop Stand, 4 Stand Support Screws, User Manual
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of the product, kindly call us at 080-4660 9211 or marq@flipkart.com for assistance.

product_description.Wide Viewing Angle: Boasting a wide viewing angle of 178°, this TV offers a comfortable view of the scenes even if you’re sitting at an angle from the screen.
product_description.Fast Refresh Rate: This TV has a refresh rate of 60 Hz, which means that it renders smooth and flowing transitions of images and scenes. So, you won't experience a lag or any glitch while enjoying your favourite shows.

Pros:
- can change brightness, contrast over any input (inc HDMI)... generally not available in low cost TV's
-- nice screen pannel around this price segment
-- was able to play 1080p 60Hz with lag not visible normally
-- option for sound balance and surround given
-- 2 hdmi + 2 usb
Cons:
-- build quality below average...had to check for any cracks by removing all plastics all over the body and screen... better to be kept /fix at a place for long run
-- can't say anything about the life after seeing build quality (warranty is not given for body breakage)
-- simple ui still TV takes time to power on and change settings.
Amazing TV for the prize🥰♥️Thank you flipkart🤍🛍🛍🛍

Bought this for one of the bedrooms. Quite good for the price and has ample HDMI ports and also even has an optical out which surprised me. The outer shell is not that great and looks a bit cheap (the port cutouts are not finished properly) but can't really complain for this price. The panel is pretty good with no uneven tint or other issues that are quite common with cheap TVs.
